Package au.edu.anu.twapps.mm

Interface IMMController

All Superinterfaces:
au.edu.anu.omhtk.preferences.Preferenceable
public interface IMMController extends au.edu.anu.omhtk.preferences.Preferenceable
Interface for the controller (cf: MVC) of ModelMaker (MMModel).
Author:
Ian Davies - 17 Dec. 2018

    getPreferences, putPreferences

  • Method Details

    • visualiser

      IGraphVisualiser visualiser()
      Owners of the controller interface (MMModel) have a need to directly call methods of the visualisation interface. This will be hidden in a future release by making all such calls via the controller itself.
      Returns:
      interface to the configuration graph visualisation.

    • onProjectClosing

      void onProjectClosing()
      Inform the controller that a project is closing. Typically, a controller will ask the view to clear elements in the display.

    • onProjectOpened

      void onProjectOpened​(fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.TreeGraph<VisualNode,​VisualEdge> layoutGraph)
      Actions to take when a new project is opened. The controller will ask the view to build itself based upon information in the layout graph.

      Parameters:
      layoutGraph - The graph that maintains layout information.

    • onNodeSelected

      void onNodeSelected​(VisualNode n)
      Actions to take when a node has been selected by the user.

      Parameters:
      n - The user selected node.

    • onNewNode

      void onNewNode​(VisualNode n)
      Actions to take when a new node has been added to the configuration graph.

      Parameters:
      n - The newly constructed node

    • onNewEdge

      void onNewEdge​(VisualEdge e)
      Actions to take when a new edge has been added to the configuration graph.

      Parameters:
      e - The newly constructed edge.

    • onNodeDeleted

      void onNodeDeleted()
      Actions to take when a configuration node has been deleted.

    • onEdgeDeleted

      void onEdgeDeleted()
      Actions to take when a configuration edge has been deleted.

    • onElementRenamed

      void onElementRenamed()
      Actions to take when a configuration element (node or edge) has been renamed.

    • onTreeCollapse

      void onTreeCollapse()
      Actions to take when a sub-tree of a node has been collapsed.

    • onTreeExpand

      void onTreeExpand()
      Actions to take when a sub-tree of a node has been expanded.

    • onItemEdit

      void onItemEdit​(Object item)
      Actions to take when the properties of an element (node or edge) have changed.

      Parameters:
      item - The element that has had changes to its properties. Its class will be implementation specific.

    • doLayout

      void doLayout​(double duration)
      Apply the current layout algorithm to the graph visualisation.

      Parameters:
      duration - Time in milliseconds for animation of the action

    • doFocusedLayout

      void doFocusedLayout​(VisualNode root, LayoutType layout, double duration)
      Apply the given layout algorithm using given node as the root.

      Parameters:
      root - The node that will form the root of the layout (ignored if the current layout algorithm is not a tree layout).
      layout - The LayoutType to be used.
      duration - Time in milliseconds for animation of the action.

    • setDefaultTitle

      void setDefaultTitle()
      Set a default title for the ModelMaker window.

    • onRollback

      void onRollback​(fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.TreeGraph<VisualNode,​VisualEdge> layoutGraph)
      Actions to take when the configuration graph has been rolled back to some other previously saved state.

      Parameters:
      layoutGraph - The new layout graph.

    • getUnEditablePropertyKeys

      Collection<String> getUnEditablePropertyKeys​(String classId)
      Queries MMModel to return all property keys for nodes with the given classId. The IGraphVisualiser requires this to disable editing of immutable properties.

      Parameters:
      classId - The class of node.
      Returns:
      All keys of immutable properties of nodes of this class (can be empty).

    • onAddRemoveProperty

      void onAddRemoveProperty​(VisualNode vn)
      Actions to take when optional properties are added or removed from a node.

      Parameters:
      vn - the node containing the relevant properties.

    • setLayoutRoot

      VisualNode setLayoutRoot​(VisualNode layoutRoot)
      Set the current layout root. This only has meaning when a tree LayoutType is used. If layoutRoot is null, the new root will be the true root of the tree, even if the tree is broken.

      Parameters:
      layoutRoot - The new layout root. If null, the layout root will be the true root of the tree. If
      Returns:
      the previous layout root.

    • getLayoutRoot

      VisualNode getLayoutRoot()
      Gets the current layout root.

      Returns:
      current layout root.

    • onRootNameChange

      void onRootNameChange()
      Actions to take if the layout root name has changed (i.e uptake controls as required).

    • model

      IMMModel model()
      The model interface IMMModel controlled by this controller.

      Returns:
      The model interface.
